issue.title: [Packaging] Distribute in Debian Repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4450](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4450). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Distribute Arrow in Debian repo: 

<https://www.debian.org/doc/manuals/distribute-deb/distribute-deb.html#adding-packages-to-debian>

 

Required to publish Arrow R package into CRAN.
